release.message: Once you have downloaded the 1.5 distribution, please update Epsilon from the stable update site to version 1.5.1, which contains a fix for a regression that affects the properties view of Exeed.

dependency.name: Emfatic
dependency.notes: Untick the " Group items by category " check box

dependency.name: GMF Tooling
dependency.notes: Install Graphical Modelling Framework (GMF) Tooling SDK

dependency.name: QVTo
dependency.notes: Recent version of QVTo that works with GMF Tooling

dependency.name: Emfatic
dependency.notes: Untick the " Group items by category " check box

dependency.name: GMF Tooling

dependency.name: QVTo
dependency.notes: Older version of QVTo that works with GMF Tooling

dependency.name: Emfatic
dependency.notes: Untick the " Group items by category " check box

dependency.name: GMF
dependency.location: Install through the Help->Install Modeling Components menu.
